name: |][-@I7 in vitro #デッド・インヴィトロ
name_original: |][-@I7 in vitro #デッド・インヴィトロ
description:
■Outline
Target Age All ages
Game Genre Bullet Hell Shooter
Duration 30 min.

■Controls
From INPUT, you can switch to the setting for external adjustment key assignment.
[keyboard].
Z : OK
X : Back

Cross key : Movement of the unit (8 directions)
Z : Shot / Lock shot(press and hold to Lock Shot)
X : Mystery(Bomb)
C : Full auto shot
esc : Force quit

[Controller (PS4 Controller)]
Joystick button 0 (0 button): OK
Joystick button 1 (X button): Back

L stick : Move your ship (8 directions)
Joystick button 2 (0): Shot / Lock shot (press and hold for lock shot)
Joystick button 5 (R1 button): Mystery(Bomb)
Joystick button 3 (△ button): Full auto shot
Joystick button 9 (Option button): Forced exit

■Game Rules
[Basic rules]
Defeat the boss that appears at the end of the stage so that your LIFE does not reach 0. If you are hit by enemy bullets, your LIFE will decrease by 1, and when your LIFE reaches 0, the game is over.

[Rank System]
The RANK changes depending on your actions during the game, and the difficulty level changes significantly. The higher the RANK, the higher the score. The game also changes when certain other conditions are met.

Mystery activation: +1
Mystery triggered while Mystery is triggered: +1
Mystery ends: -1
Mystery hit: -1
